org.eclipse.swt.examples.paint

インタフェース PaintSession

  • すべてのスーパーインタフェース:
    java.util.EventListener, org.eclipse.swt.events.MouseListener, org.eclipse.swt.events.MouseMoveListener, org.eclipse.swt.internal.SWTEventListener
    既知のサブインタフェースのリスト:
    PaintTool
    既知の実装クラスのリスト:
    AirbrushTool, BasicPaintSession, ContinuousPaintSession, DragPaintSession, EllipseTool, LineTool, PencilTool, PolyLineTool, RectangleTool, RoundedRectangleTool, SegmentedPaintSession, TextTool

    public interface PaintSession
extends org.eclipse.swt.events.MouseListener, org.eclipse.swt.events.MouseMoveListener
    Manages an interactive paint session. Note that the coordinates received via the listener interfaces are virtualized to zero-origin relative to the painting surface.

    • メソッドのサマリー

      メソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      void beginSession()
      Activates the session.
      void endSession()
      Deactivates the session.
      java.lang.String getDisplayName()
      Returns the name associated with this tool.
      PaintSurface getPaintSurface()
      Returns the paint surface associated with this paint session
      void resetSession()
      Resets the session.

      • インタフェースから継承されたメソッド org.eclipse.swt.events.MouseListener

        mouseDoubleClick, mouseDown, mouseUp

      • インタフェースから継承されたメソッド org.eclipse.swt.events.MouseMoveListener

        mouseMove

    • メソッドの詳細

      • getPaintSurface

        PaintSurface getPaintSurface()
        Returns the paint surface associated with this paint session
        戻り値:
        the associated PaintSurface

      • beginSession

        void beginSession()
        Activates the session. Note: When overriding this method, call super.beginSession() at method start.

      • endSession

        void endSession()
        Deactivates the session. Note: When overriding this method, call super.endSession() at method exit.

      • resetSession

        void resetSession()
        Resets the session. Aborts any operation in progress. Note: When overriding this method, call super.resetSession() at method exit.

      • getDisplayName

        java.lang.String getDisplayName()
        Returns the name associated with this tool.
        戻り値:
        the localized name of this tool
